class_notes:
(Same as WGS 585 3)
(This seminar will emphasize qualitative ethnographic research including interviewing and fieldwork. As such, we will engage the practical question of how to research, observe, describe, record and present material about theoretical questions in the contemporary world. Our substantive focus will be feminist/queer ethnography.)
sections: Class Nbr: 4854, Section #: 5, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-4p, Instructor: K. Karkazis, Status: Open
